user-stories.description: As a product owner, I want to create user stories
As a product owner, I want to add epics to a project
As a product owner, I want to create sprints with a start and end date
As a product owner, I want to assign team members to a project
As a product owner, I want to create various personas for a specific project
As a product owner, I want to add assignees to a specific user story so that the project team knows who is working on this user story
As a product owner, I want to add personas to specific user stories so that the developers will have a better understanding of the user
As a developer, I want to add tasks to a specific user story so that I know what has to be done
As a developer or product owner, I want to add labels to a user story so that it gains more information about what to do with it
As an assignee, I want to add notes to a user story so that I can communicate with other assignees on the specific user story
As a product owner, I want to add a start and end date to a specific user story so that time management becomes easier
As a product owner, I want to add acceptance criteria to a user story
As a product owner, I want to annotate words in a user story as a class or as a method so that the project team has the same mental model
As a tester, I want to be able to add tests to a specific user story
As a developer and product owner, I want the Kanban board story cards to be minimalistic so that the view isn’t overloaded
As a developer and product owner, I want to click on the Kanban board story cards to get more information about a specific story card
As a product owner or developer, I want to filter story cards in a kanban board according to various criteria, such as label, assignee, etc.
As a product owner or developer, I want to drag and drop story cards into one of the columns, i.e., not-started, in-progress and done
As a project team member, I want to be able to see which is the current sprint
As a developer, I want to see which classes in a specific user story are already created and which aren't
As a product owner, I want to see which classes belong or relate to a specific user story
As a tester, I want to see how many tests pass and fail for a specific user story
As a product owner, I want to have a quick overview if the acceptance criteria of a user story is fulfilled
As a product owner, I want to have a quick overview on the progress and status of a specific project
As a product owner, I want to have a quick overview on the progress of a specific epic’s user stories
As a product owner, I want to see if epics start and end date overlap so that I can manage the time in the project team properly
As a developer, I want to see if user stories start and end date overlap so that I can manage my development time
As a developer, I want and need to obtain a feedback when a class or a method name referred in a user story changes
As a user, I want to add a new contact to an address book
As a user, I want to add a new phone number to a contact

scenarios.description: adding a phone number to a contact  with no phone number

user-stories.description: As a user, I want to edit the first name of a specific contact
As a user, I want to edit the last name of a specific contact
As a user, I want to edit a specific phone number of a specific contact
As a user, I want to remove an entire contact
As a user, I want to remove a specific property, such as a specific phone number, of a specific contact

epics.title: Place an online order
epics.description: This epic covers requirements that specify how can one place an online order

user-stories.description: As a registered or unregistered user, I want to explore the online menu
As a registered or unregistered user, I want to add the menu items to the shopping cart
As a registered user, I want to do one click payment
As an unregistered user, I want to enter my delivery and payment details to make the payment

epics.title: Place an order in a restaurant
epics.description: This epic covers requirements that specify how can one place an order in a restaurant

user-stories.description: As a waiter, I want to enter the selected menu items by guests to prepare an order
As a waiter, I want to be able to forward the received order to the chef
As a waiter, I want to be able to customize the order by modifying the default menu items

epics.title: Invoicing
epics.description: This epic covers requirements that specify how invoices are calculated

user-stories.description: As a restaurant owner, I want to update the tax values for both online and offline orders, in case they legally change
As a restaurant owner, I want to update the tax values for individual menu items
As a waiter, I want to be able to view the invoice before printing it to check if the correct prices and tax is applied
As a waiter, I want to be able to view the total price before printing the invoice
